title: The game cannot connect or reconnect
body:
The internet is on and everything is ok.....

But the game cannot connect on the time....The means is the server let me AFK....

22/4/2015

replies.body:
Sounds like a firewall issue. If that is the case, here's how to fix it:

(windows 7 (should be similar in other windows versions))
1. open control panel
2. open 'system and security' tab
3. open 'windows firewall'
4. on the left hand side, click 'allow a program....')
5. click 'change settings'
6. locate League of Legends (either on the list, or by pressing 'allow another program', and finding it there)
7. check every box you can, and click OK
8. now, on the left, click 'advanced settings'
9. on the left choose 'inbound rules'
10. locate League of Legends, and if there are any grey ones; right click them and choose 'activate rule'
11. once all of the League of Legends ones (probably about 4) are green, you should be good to go - at least it worked for me ;)
(My OS language is not in english, and couldn't be bothered to change it, so I just translated all the names in ' ' - the names might not be 100% what I wrote here)
So what do you want done about it? Why provide a date without a time, or any other information pertaining to the game? Not like anything *would* be done about it.
